metadata.name: Artisan Workshop - Unique Design
metadata.description: A completely unique artisan template with workshop-inspired layout, grid-based design, and craft-focused aesthetics

props.className: w-10 h-10 rounded-lg flex items-center justify-center animate-toolFloat
max-w-7xl mx-auto grid grid-cols-1 lg:grid-cols-3 gap-8 items-center

children: {{content.story.origin || 'Every piece tells a story of dedication, skill, and passion. From the first sketch to the final polish, we pour our hearts into creating something truly extraordinary.'}}

children: {{content.story.unique || 'We blend traditional techniques with modern innovation, creating pieces that honor the past while embracing the future. Each creation is a testament to our commitment to excellence.'}}
{{content.story.vision || 'To preserve the art of true craftsmanship while inspiring a new generation of artisans. We believe in creating not just products, but lasting legacies.'}}
